articles.title: Ohio police officers shot fleeing Black man dozens of times, lawyer says
articles.description: Police killed Jayland Walker, a Black man in Ohio, by shooting him dozens of times as he ran from officers following a traffic stop, a lawyer for his family said, citing a review of police body-worn camera footage due to be made public on Sunday.
